commitResults.messageTitle: Remove Duke.java
Implement Bento Greeting and Exit
Modify README.md
Implement echo behaviour and exit behaviour on bye input
Implement adding of task behavior and listing task behaviour Inputting list will make Bento list all tasks. Otherwise, Bento assumes input to be task and adds it to the list.

Add Task and Main class. Implement marking and unmarking behavior. Main class as entry point into program. Task class to better help organize program flow. Bento will mark/unmark tasks based on index provided. Will need to handle cases when invalid indexes are provided in the future.

Modify code to adhere with coding standards. Add try-catch blocks to account for out of bounds indexing and wrong inputs. Catch errors where user might provide non-integer inputs or out of bounds task number.
Refactor codebase Extract constants such as GREETING_MESSAGE. Extract methods such as printNoTaskMessage()
Add ToDo Class and refactor code
Implement Deadline and Event classes and refactor code
Refactor code and remove magic numbers

Add generate_expected.sh and runtest_bento.sh and modify input.txt While generate_expected.sh helps to automatically generate EXPECTED.TXT, its contents must still be verified manually before use with runtest_bento.sh input.txt should include mis-inputs in the future as the commands/inputs grow.
Update generate_expected.sh
Create generic exception classes
Implement Task and ToDo specific exceptions
Implement Deadline specific exception
Implement Event specific exception
Update marking exceptions
Update text parsing behaviours and exceptions
Merge branch 'branch-Level-5'
Refactor code into packages
Merge branch 'branch-A-Packages'
Refactor code according to PR comments
Remove addTask method
Make Task class abstract and refactor code
Implement delete command

Implement task list saving behavior - Able to load and save from ./data/save.txt - Update tasks to return themselves as user commands - Introduce new exceptions for when load and save processes encounter errors - Will create new save.txt if not found - Loading tasks makes use of handleUserInput which outputs success messages - TODO: Create handleCommand functions that supress success messages
Merge branch 'branch-Level-6'
Merge branch 'branch-Level-7'
Update saveTaskList behavior - Will now create a /data directory if not already created - Introduced constants for readability and reusability - Attempted and tested program with JAR file
Suppress success messages when loading from save.txt - Introduce fromUserInput flag to determine whether to output success messages - After loading, Bento will list all tasks
Remove /data directory from repository - /data directory should only be present/created when the user uses Bento
Refactor code - Introduce writeTaskStatus method in saveTaskList - Introduce printMarkUpdate method in markTaskAsDone

Introduce additonal OOP classes - Introduced abstract Command class with downstream classes overriding execute method - Introduced Storage class to handle loading and saving of tasks - Introduced TaskList class to manage user tasks - Introduced Parser class to process user inputs as commands - Introduced Ui class for I/O functionality
Add displayErrorMessage method for Ui

Refactor code - Current behavior when save file is corrupted/not of the same format:   - Bento will load the save file up till the point of corruption   - Everything after the point of corruption is unfortunately lost
Merge branch 'branch-A-MoreOOP'

Modify Deadline and Event classes to take in LocalDate instead of Strings - User must provide valid dates of the form dd/MM/yyyy in /by field for deadlines - User must provide valid dates of the same form in /from and /to field for events - Exceptions will be thrown should the user not comply - Saving and loading mechanism updated to work with changes

Add show command to display deadlines/events associated with date of interest - Usage: show dd/MM/yyyy - Bento currently throws a default exception when user provides the wrong date - Bento will tell user if no tasks associated with the provided date of interest is found
Fix DEFAULT_MESSAGE in BentoException
Add custom InvalidDateFormatException
Add new constants for better reusability
Introduce new constants
Merge pull request #1 from averageandyyy/branch-Level-8
